name: Dream Stacks
description:
What is this game?

Dreams Stacks is a cozy matching game about creating dreams using stackable pogs!

How do I play?

There's a simple tutorial in the game. But just in case:


What are the controls?

But really it's all drag-and-drop. You can play with a mouse or on mobile.
